messages.subject: Texans   (was: Re:  Where do you live??)
messages.msgSnippet: See??  If you call them, they will come!  Yippee!!! Hi Nancy, I know just where Commerce is!  My husband worked in Greenville for about two months and we spent
messages.messageBody:
See?? If you call them, they will come! Yippee!!!
Hi Nancy,
I know just where Commerce is! My husband worked in Greenville for about
two months and we spent a lot of time there. Downtown is so cute! Are you
ever on this side of town? Maybe we could get together!

Jennifer

Hi! Jennifer,I am new to this board and new to unschooling. I have been
homeschooling for 4 years, but have recently decided to unschool. I live in
Commerce, TX which is about 50 miles north east of Dallas. Nancy
